title: Added ability to run command line only cvars (thanks to Emoose)
author: dirtydanisreal

title: Informational: the intro videos can also be skipped by passing a command line argument to the binary
body: The intro skip can be done with +com_skipIntroVideo 1 command-line argument to the game executable through game launch options in steam so the hook in this library is not required.
author: Sipu

comments.body: Yes I'm well aware of this command-line argument. The skip intro hook sets the same flag that having "+com_skipIntroVideo 1" as a command-line argument will. It still has its use for people that don't know about this and those using the Xbox version as it does not easily allow you to change command-line arguments.
